name: Frozen Yutto Remedies
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ *** With items gathered during the Penumbra quests and found in Alappaa, you can create 3 different kinds of Yutto Remedies. The base for all is the same, just the last components differ depending which type you wish to build. Note: Every step requires 1100 in Pharmacy skill and every product comes in stack of 5. *** #L "Yuttos Filter" "269884" #L "Permafrost Residue" "269872" #L "Empty Permafrost Stimulant Chamber" "269891" #L "Volatile Permafrost Chemicals" "269893" or #L "Viscous Permafrost Chemicals" "269894" or #L "Regenerative Permafrost Chemicals" "269895" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ The Base: Yuttos Filter + Permafrost Residue = #L "Filtered Permafrost Residue" "269890" Skills: | PH | Filtered Permafrost Residue + Empty Permafrost Stimulant Chamber = #L "Full Permafrost Stimulant Chamber" "269892" Skills: | PH | ------------------------------ The variations: Cold damage Full Permafrost Stimulant Chamber + Volatile Permafrost Chemicals = #L "Frozen Yuttos Remedy - Bane" "269865" Skills: | PH | Note: Runs Vengeful Ward of Penumbra in your NCU (+50 cold damage, +500 Cold AC) ------------------------------ Add all defence Full Permafrost Stimulant Chamber + Viscous Permafrost Chemicals = #L "Frozen Yuttos Remedy - Icy Scales" "269866" Skills: | PH | Note: Runs Protective Ward of Penumbra in your NCU (+5 AAD, +500 Cold AC) ------------------------------ Heal and Nano Delta Full Permafrost Stimulant Chamber + Regenerative Permafrost Chemicals = #L "Frozen Yuttos Remedy - Tonic" "269867" Skills: | PH | Note: Runs Regenerative Ward of Penumbra in your NCU (+2 heal delta, +2 nano delta, +500 Cold AC) ------------------------------
